item.description:
Hi Everyone,

http://www.JPopenstud...

I am a member of this meetup and am inviting all to visit the Jamaica Plain Open Studios this weekend. I am exhibiting my paintings and photographs and some hand-painted decorative birdhouses.
The link above will tell you all you need to know as well as A PREVIEW online of the artists' work.
Lots of fun, walk around JP, have coffee & ice cream at JP Licks or have a great meal at one of the many restaurants.
Hope to see you there!

Karen O'Brien
cupcakeartist.com
item.how_to_find_us: I am inside the building. (dining room)

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: Jamaica Plain Open Studios -this weekend, Sept 26 & 27 11-6 PM
